gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views.commonFunctionality

Interface RefexViewI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EmbeddableViewI, IsaacViewI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRefexView

    @Contract
public interface RefexViewI
extends EmbeddableViewI
    RefsetViewI An interface that allows the creation of a RefexView implementation, which will be a JavaFX component that extends Region that can be embedded into other views, the purpose of which is to display Refex information for a component.
    Author:
    Dan Armbrust

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setAssemblage(int assemblageConceptNid, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showStampColumns, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showActiveOnly, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showFullHistory)
      Tell this view to display the refexes for a particular assemblage concept.
      void setComponent(int componentNid, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showStampColumns, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showActiveOnly, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showFullHistory)
      Tell this view to display the refexes for a particular component (typically, a concept, but could also be any valid thing that supportes refexes) With this call - multiple assemblages will be shown - for a single component (concept)

      • Methods inherited from interface gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views.EmbeddableViewI

        getView

    • Method Detail

      • setComponent

        void setComponent(int componentNid,
                  javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showStampColumns,
                  javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showActiveOnly,
                  javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showFullHistory)
        Tell this view to display the refexes for a particular component (typically, a concept, but could also be any valid thing that supportes refexes) With this call - multiple assemblages will be shown - for a single component (concept)
        Parameters:
        componentNid - - the component to show.
        showStampColumns - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for show/hiding the stamp, instead bind to this.
        showActiveOnly - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for activeOnly / all, instead bind to this.
        showFullHistory - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for show current / show all, instead bind to this.

      • setAssemblage

        void setAssemblage(int assemblageConceptNid,
                   javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showStampColumns,
                   javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showActiveOnly,
                   javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty showFullHistory)
        Tell this view to display the refexes for a particular assemblage concept. With this call - only a single assemblage will be shown - but multiple components may be shown (typically concepts, but could also be any valid thing that supports refexes, such as descriptions)
        Parameters:
        assemblageConceptNid - - the assemblage to show
        showStampColumns - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for show/hiding the stamp, instead bind to this.
        showActiveOnly - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for activeOnly / all, instead bind to this.
        showFullHistory - - (optional) if provided, don't show toggle buttons for show current / show all, instead bind to this.
